name: Gamified Learning Platform
description: Developed as a member of Google Developer Student Clubs McMaster’s open-source team, this web app aims to tackle students’ distracted learning and low engagement rates by adding interactive game-like elements to online education modules (such as leaderboards and point-redemption systems).

name: My Personal Website - this page!
description: I created this website from scratch over the summer of 2024 to knock down two birds with one stone—not only did I finally have a way to showcase my projects and skills all in one place, but I was able to get well-acquainted with using React.js for front-end projects.

name: Bus Buddy: Route Optimizer
description: Bus Buddy was a web prototype that intended to give more students access to efficient school transportation. By using clustering and depth-first search algorithms, the app would formulate optimal bus stop locations within school zones and map the most fuel-efficient paths for bus drivers to follow. I built the project with three others during the hackathon Deltahacks X; we won 1st place for 'Best DEI (Diversity, Equity, & Inclusion) Hack'!

name: ChordGuru - Chord Recombinator
description: ChordGuru is a web app that identifies music chords from a given group of notes, using principles from music set theory. It aspires to help students learning music theory or composers experimenting with note combinations, and supports a variety of input methods for ease of use towards all types of musicians (such as a virtual piano, microphone, and a music staff builder).
